Description: The technical specifications to refer when using the package. Easy-going, offline supported (via web PWA installation), and detailed oriented. Courtesy from ZORALab's Hestia.

Designs.Description: This component was designed by the following creators:
Designs.Title: Designers

Designs.Description:
This component has the following dependencies (arranged in the order from
left-top to right-bottom):
Designs.Title: Dependencies

Designs.Description:
For HTML, ZORALab's Hestia employs the W3C native syntax for simplicity and
maximum compatibility sakes. ZORALab's Hestia recommends the following HTML code
structure for this component.
Designs.Title: HTML

Designs.Description: The minimum required HTML codes are shown below:
Designs.Title: Minimum HTML

Designs.Description: The compound list HTML codes are shown below:
Designs.Title: Compound List HTML

Designs.Description:
ZORALab's Hestia heavily rely on CSS to style this component and offering its
css variables for customizations. Below are the list of available CSS variables
at your disposal.
Designs.Title: CSS

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --olist-display
CSS PROPERTY : display
DEFAULT      : block (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the display mode of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Display

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --olist-margin
CSS PROPERTY : margin
DEFAULT      : 0 auto (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the margin of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Margin

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --olist-padding
CSS PROPERTY : padding
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the padding of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Padding

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --ulist-text-align
CSS PROPERTY : text-align
DEFAULT      : left (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the text alignment of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Text Align

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --olist-li-margin
CSS PROPERTY : margin
DEFAULT      : 4rem 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the list item's margin of for the rendered component.
Designs.Title: List Item Margin

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --olist-li-padding
CSS PROPERTY : padding
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the list item's padding of for the rendered component.
Designs.Title: List Item Padding

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --olist-li-before-margin
CSS PROPERTY : margin
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description:
Affects the before-pseudo-element's margin of the list item (bullet) for the
rendered component.
Designs.Title: Bullet Margin

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --olist-li-before-padding
CSS PROPERTY : padding
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description:
Affects the before-pseudo-element's padding of the list item (bullet) for the
rendered component.
Designs.Title: Bullet Padding

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --olist-li-before-font-size
CSS PROPERTY : font-size
DEFAULT      : 2.6rem (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description:
Affects the before-pseudo-element's font size of the list item (bullet) for
the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Bullet Font Size

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --olist-li-before-font-weight
CSS PROPERTY : font-weight
DEFAULT      : 800 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description:
Affects the before-pseudo-element's font weight of the list item (bullet) for
the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Bullet Font Weight

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --olist-li-before-text-align
CSS PROPERTY : text-align
DEFAULT      : left (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description:
Affects the before-pseudo-element's text alignment of the list item (bullet) for
the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Bullet Text Align

Designs.Description: Fortunately, this component does not use any JavaScript. Relax.
Designs.Title: JavaScript

Functions.Description: Render the CSS output for this UI component.
Functions.Title: ToCSS

ObjectiveAndPurposes.Description:
This package's primary purpose is to provide user interface (UI) styling
specifically for ordered list values.
ObjectiveAndPurposes.Title: Main Purpose

ObjectiveAndPurposes.Description:
This package was known as 'olist_hestiaUI' before
ZORALab's Hestia 'v1.2.0'. The transformation was due to someone attempting to
steal the design copyrights and makes way for programming package's
documentation restructuring.
ObjectiveAndPurposes.Title: Legacy Recording

Title: zoralabOLIST Technical Specification - ZORALab's Hestia
